welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sulphur, a charming city known for its natural beauty and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our breathtaking landscapes and experience the unique charm of our city. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chennault International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chennault International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
